amendment.description: Amendment requires that all unspent funds in Members official accounts at the end of fiscal year 1996 be returned to the Treasury to be used for deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in House Rept. 104-146, to require all unspent funds in Members' allowances at the end of FY 1996 be returned to the Treasury to be used for deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zimmer amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 403 - 21 (Roll no. 415).
